default.system: Summarize in exactly 2 words, no punctuation.

with_existing.system: Summarize in exactly 2 words, no punctuation. Make sure your label is distinct from existing labels - use different words, not numbered variants.

retry.system: Generate a 2-word label that is COMPLETELY DIFFERENT from existing labels. Use different words, NOT numbered variants or slight variations.

hard_retry.system: CRITICAL: You MUST generate a completely different 2-word label. Use DIFFERENT WORDS entirely, NOT numbered variants (e.g., not 'AI' and 'AI 2'). The label must be semantically distinct with different concepts.
